availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Cole Catlett on November 14, 1832. Father of Martha Catlett, William Catlett, James Catlett, Mildred Catlett, Elijah Catlett, Amanda Catlett, May Catlett, and George Catlett. Farmer in Anderson County in 1850 and 1860. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in Anderson County in 1850. Owned seventeen enslaved persons in Anderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 219A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 7.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 2.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 001550673, p. 526.
